Audit complete. Report saved to `NETWORK_AUDIT_2026-02-20_234905.md`. Here's the summary:

# 🔍 Full Network Audit Report

> 📅 **February 20, 2026 23:49** · 🤖 Junos MCP v11.0 + Ollama (gpt-oss) · ⏱️ 4817.7s · 🖥️ 11 devices

---

## 📊 0. Executive Summary

| Metric | Value |
|--------|-------|
| **Network Health Score** | 🔴 **0/100** (F — CRITICAL) |
| **Devices Audited** | 11 |
| **Critical Issues** | 11 |
| **Warnings** | 11 |
| **Config Drifts** | 0 |

> ▲ **Top Risk:** OSPF adjacency failures detected. Review Section 4 for root cause analysis.

> ◈ **AI Summary:** All core routers are unreachable due to a management‑network connectivity failure. This blocks every routing protocol and MPLS service, causing a full network outage. Restoring the physical or management link will automatically bring all protocols back online.

---
